tool_description:
Join the millions of readers who turn to Reading Home digital library to access bookss including Personal Growth, True Crime, Business, Travel, Non-Fiction, Contemporary Fiction, YA, Science Fiction, and more.

Download App at

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.elabdtech.reading_home
name: Reading Home APIs
title: Reading Home APIs

api_list.name: GetBookDetail
api_list.description: Get Detail of book by Book ID

api_list.name: GetBooksbyTitleSearch
api_list.description: Get Paginated List of Books on Title Searched

api_list.name: GetBooksbyAuthorSearch
api_list.description: Get List of Books of a Searched Author Name

api_list.name: Getbooksbycategory
api_list.description: This will get a paginated list of books in a specific category

api_list.name: GetAllCategories
api_list.description: Get Paginated List of All Categories
